attributes.action: raise an immediate revenue for international hauliers entering uk soil.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for 9 years gordon brown was chancellor he knows the figures british haulage is dead. for 9 years he has turned a blind eye to the rape and philandeering of our haulage industry, extreme inefficienty on mr. browns behalf. as people who actually know whats going on in our own country we demand an immediate tax to be raised on all uk ports, for non uk lorries entering uk soil. after heavy consultation we believe a one hundred pound levy every 96 hours

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
